name: Yguan.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Yong Guan's personal project demo page

In here, you can see the live demos of some of Yong's JavaScript projects. All code in Yong's repositories is under MIT license, and you're free to do whatever you want with the code. Below are the screenshots with links for the projects.

#### D3.js Playground

As I learn about D3.js, reusable chart classes are created, and eventually something good will arrive.

[![Image](image/d3-playground.png?raw=true)](d3-playground/index.html)

#### Bookmark Tagging

This is a Chrome extension that allows you to manage your bookmarks with tags instead of folders. The Web version has some missing functionality due to the security permission in Chrome. If you like the demo, you can [download the extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/bookmarks-tagging/kmdepbjjhlbhohppiancfgdpkjcoajgb?hl=en) from the Chrome Web Store.

[![Image](image/bookmark-tagging.png?raw=true)](bookmark-tagging/index.html)

#### Hack Day JS Projects in 2012

This is a showcase for some of the JavaScript projects I did on the once-a-month hack days while I was at Daptiv.

[![Image](image/bookmark-tagging.png?raw=true)](hackday-js/index.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
